Meta_Tags.title: Filo | Find Your Phone
Meta_Tags.keywords: filo-tag, filo, technology, bluetooth-device, device, filo tag, how it works
Meta_Tags.description:
Attach it. Ring it. Find it.
Attach Filo to all your personal objects to find them through a very simple mobile app.

Blocks.title: Find your smartphone
Blocks.description:
How many times have you left your smartphone somewhere with the silent mode on?

Find it easily with Filo! Just press the button on your Filo to make your smartphone ring, even if itâ€™s in silent mode!
